page.title: 08Darlington's "Mr. Tidy"
page.content:
{ Mr Steve Wilson}is the {Enviromental Care Officer}employed by Darlington Borough Council. He says he originally wanted to be a horticulturist and was once a self- employed gardener but in Winter time people tended to go indoors and forget all about their gardens, so there was not enough work to keep him busy.
As Enviromental Care Oficer Mr Wilson gives talks to children in Darlington schools. At the end of these talks he sometimes hands out in- centives, such as posters and T-shirts, to encourage the pupils to keep Britain tidy. Mr Wilson invented a character called{Brian 'Tidy' Tucky, or BT for short, which is part of the {Keep Britain Tidy Scheme. {Anne Buckle }
